name: Streamhub
description: Real time analytics provider for media
overview:
Streamhub is the real-time analytics service to optimise multi-screen content performance for the media industry. We make managing ‘big data’ easy for you.

Streamhub’s vision is to enable media companies to derive intelligent insights from data across all relevant media platforms. The mass and complexity of data available today, pooled and collated into one central dashboard will help optimise content performance across scheduling, distribution, marketing and advertising. The Streamhub service is designed to assist in making more effective decisions in both real time and retrospectively throughout all levels of an organisation.

Streamhub provides real-time programme analytics, incorporating both online and offline data that is imported, analysed and delivered into a user friendly interface (live dashboard). Unlike existing video analytics services, we import data across all platforms including online video, social network data, offline TV viewing data plus other influential factors effecting TV viewing (e.g the weather, YouTube trends, etc).

The Streamhub service can be adapted to the specific needs of TV Channels and online video platforms and individual divisions within the media organisations, with further data analysis enabled into platforms, channels, individual content or other specific data fields captured by the system. Information and data trends can now automatically be delivered to people’s screens with immediacy, providing targeted and actionable insights.

Streamhub was one of the top 10 finalists for MIPCUBE Lab Startup Competition at MIPTV held in Cannes for 8th to 10th April, 2013, and was honoured with special commendation and second place.

Streamhub is a brand and publicly face name of Five Cool Consulting Ltd. founded by Aki Tsuchiya and Nick Ten Cate in 2009.

Please visit www.streamhub.co.uk
